metadata.title: CVE-2018-10914 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: It was found that an attacker could issue a xattr request via glusterfsFUSE to cause gluster brick process to crash which will result in a remotedenial of service. If gluster multiplexing is enabled this will result in acrash of multiple bricks and gluster volumes.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
